SUB_W01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
So the door to this world is a boulder?
Mmm. I understand now what it is the
denizens of this place fear.

SUB_W01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
I feel I have seen this door before,
yet it seems somehow...different.

SUB_W01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.text:
That's Rakusuiro Tower. It feels different
with all these stone fortresses, but this
is most certainly Miyako.

SUB_W01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_01.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_01.text:
I wager you perished here and awoke in
Brighthome, Lifetaker. What did you do
in this land—and how did you die?
The questions are endless.

SUB_W01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_03.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_03.text:
To walk through that gate means
you are no ordinary people.

SUB_W01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_05.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_05.text:
Lend me your power, O mighty ones!
If you do not, I may be forced to deem
you my enemies.

SUB_W01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_06.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_06.text:
This is how you would greet a liege?
I am the Dismal King, and I take no
orders from the likes of you.

SUB_W01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_08.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_08.text:
It seems we will be encountering obstacles
on our journey to retrace your past.

SUB_W01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_09.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_09.text:
Miyako has always been like this:
a bottomless abyss that draws in
the darkness.

SUB_W01_WRLD_SIUG_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_WRLD_SIUG_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Stay on your guard!
I sense the fae.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
Hey there, guy. You seen a strange fella
wandering around these parts, maybe?
He's wearing a fancy suit, but tends to
act real shady once he gets talking.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
Such a man spoke to us the moment we
arrived. He asked that we either lend him
our power or become his enemy.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
Pretty rude to say that to a guy on his first
day in a place. So what'd you say? You gonna
lend the power or be an enemy?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
The Dismal King does not respond
to absurdities. And yet, I suppose
this makes you his enemy.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
Only those with enemies think of others
in terms of alliances. Therefore, you are his
enemy. Indeed, perhaps the man thought
to pit me against you here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
You're thinking about this whole deal
pretty calmly considering the stakes;
I'm startin' to see why this other fella
wanted you on his side.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
I am but a traveler who seeks to
enjoy what this world has to offer.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
Well then, why not join up with me?
See, 'cause that shady fella's trying
to destroy the barrier that protects
the city, and I'm not about to let him.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text: I will travel with this man.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text: No. I must trace Lifetaker's past.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
I am currently in the process of learning
about a member of my warrior band.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
That said, it would be easier to strike
at the heart of this world if I traveled
with one who knew it well.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
I got you, bud—and heck, I know tons about
old stories and all that. So the name's
Tsunanori Mido, and I'm a student over
at Miyako Imperial University.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text: I am Siugnas, the Dismal King.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
Didn't really take you for the joking sort,
fella, but can't say I mind the energy.
So sure, 'Dismal King' it is.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
I have more important things to do than
traveling with you and becoming ensnared
in that dreadful man's schemes.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
Fair enough. I'll manage on my own. I mean, heck,
that's what I was gonna do to begin with, anyway. 
Anyway it's been a deal chattin' with you—hope
to meet again somewhere down the road.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text: A castle? Here?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Though it stands grand as King Din's castle,
it is clearly not meant for battle: see you
how joyous the people appear as they
come and go without a care.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
I sense the man we encountered earlier.
His is a powerful aura, unlike yours or
that of the fae.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Mmm. I thought this might happen.
This means your past is connected
to that man's actions—and as such,
we've no choice but to go inside.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
It doesn't appear you've come to offer
your cooperation. But if it's trouble you
seek, I will not hold back.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
While I hold a bit of curiosity as to your plan,
I've no intentions of working with you.
That said, I also do not plan to hinder your
efforts—you may carry on as you will.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text: A surprisingly fair offer.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Hear me, mascot! I intend to rend asunder
the evil-spirit talisman on this shrine! For if I do not, calamity will come to
this shopping mall! You will be fired,
and your family will face great hardship!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Mascot_Mall
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text: I... I will obey...

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Now tear that talisman apart, mascot!
Save those engaged in their custom at
this mall, as well as yourself and all
you hold dear!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text: What!?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Speak again, and I will mount
your head on my wall.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
I don't know who you are, but I doubt
you're capable of such a feat!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
What power you have! But very well.
I will step aside for now—but know
that the real fight begins soon!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Flight is a suitable strategy for one so weak.
But does this talisman truly hold that sort
of power, Lifetaker?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
I sense a power opposite that
of the fae from this talisman.
I must protect the seal.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Mascot_Mall
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
H-huh...? The heck's going on?
What am I doing here?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
That man was controlling you in an
attempt to have you destroy the
talisman that protects this building. And how was he hoping to control a plant
fiend with mere words, mmm? Did he perhaps
engage you with mistletoe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Mascot_Mall
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Mistletoe? Heck, guy, some customer just
asked me about the shrine on the roof.
I told him the area's off limits,
and then everything went fuzzy.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
There's a barrier shrine on the roof of
Sequoia Mall? Cripes, I KNEW that fella
was trying to destroy the barrier that
protects Miyako City.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
I see. That was no fiend, but a costume.
In what manner of ceremony is this used?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Are you being serious right now, guy?
That shady guy's gonna go after some
other barrier next, so how about you
forget the mascot and help me, maybe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
I sense a fixation from Lifetaker on
protecting those talismans, but I did
not come here to fight that man.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Guess I shoulda seen that coming.
Well, hope to run into you again
somewhere down the road.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
This is Sangen-in Temple. It's not much
different from the Sangen-in Temple I know,
although they prettied up the footing,
which makes it easier to walk.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text: Do you sense that man here?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Tourist_Woman
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
To think the waterfall wouldn't be flowing
TODAY of all days! Someone really should
have put up a sign or something before
I wasted my valuable time.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text: Is that meant to be a waterfall?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
I've never seen such a thing before,
but there is said to be a spring
at the heart of the temple.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
If something happened to the spring,
I wager that man is responsible.
Shall we?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
What do you intend to do
with the spring?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
You again? Why are you here?
Is this a skill of those with power?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
You led me here, churl.
Now identify yourself.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
You are outside of my jurisdiction,
powerful one—and I will not permit
you to get in my way!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
Curse you for standing
in the way of my plans!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
I just saw that shady fella leave.
What happened to Sangen-in Temple?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
He attempted to dry the spring,
but it did not go as he wanted,
and the waterfall is flowing again.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
Gosh, fella, I really appreciate your stepping
into this. Sangen-in Temple is the water barrier
of the north, which means we managed to
squash one of his little plots.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
I have no idea why I keep being led to
wherever this character happens to appear,
but I am enjoying the journey nonetheless. 
Now take me to the next place.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
You're a pretty easygoing traveler, huh?
Also gonna assume you're still not keen
on helping me out here?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
Easy is the best sort of travel;
I've no interest in your complications.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
Fair enough, bud. Hope to run into you
somewhere down the road, maybe.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_000_000.text:
While Miyako has changed,
Rakusuiro Tower has not.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Has something changed
about you, Lifetaker?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_000_020.text:
I know not. Who was I? Who did I kill
in this city? Was it people? Or fae?
Much lies hidden from me.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Mmm. Perhaps the price for revival
at Brighthome is the loss of all else.
And yet, you have at least some fragment
of your memories remaining to you.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_000_040.text:
You assume too much.
I'm sure my memory fails me simply
because too much time has passed.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_010_000.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_010_000.text: There's a fae here—a big one!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_000.text:
That man pitted us against a spider
and fled like a craven.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_010.speaker: Kaoruko_Hachijo
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_010.text:
The magatama... Scattered...
Cracked and shattered...

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_020.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_020.text: That girl is still under his sway.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_030.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_030.text:
The Hachijo are not human,
and thus must be killed.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_040.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_040.text:
Fie, Lifetaker! Have you fallen under
that man's fell sway as well?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_060.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_060.text:
Wait! This place has awakened Lifetaker's
memories. Return that girl to normal,
and it will undo the spell over him.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_070.text:
I'll go ahead and do that, guy,
but you gotta promise to hold him back!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_080.speaker: Kaoruko_Hachijo
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_080.text:
*gasp* Tsunanori? I was...
There was a man at Rakusuiro Tower...

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_090.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_090.text:
Aaagh! What was that black arm? 
It crushed my head, just like when
I cut down Hachijo...

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_100.text:
Hachijo? Are you talkin' about Prince
Yoshiaki Hachijo, maybe? What cripin'
time period is your head at, fella—
and who even ARE you?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_110.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_110.text:
That is a long tale for another time.
Don't you need to be chasing after
that man right now?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_120.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_120.text:
Yeah, guess I should. Sorry for putting you
in this kinda trouble, Kaoruko, but I gotta
catch that shady fella. If that guy's headed anywhere, it's gonna
be the metal barrier over to the west.
I'm gonna get after him, so I'll send
Tomoko to check up on you later.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_140.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_140.text:
This place and girl awakened Lifetaker's
memories. We cannot linger here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_000_000.text: You bring your Game Kid, Kentaro?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_000_010.text:
You bet, guy—and there's no way
in heck I'm gonna lose this time!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Everyone has a childhood. But though I played
to my heart's content, I could not be contained
to a place so small.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_000_040.text:
Ah, I see. This place is enclosed to ensure
they have no freedom. Does this mean it
is equally as dangerous on the outside?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_000_050.text:
Nothing is safe—not even within
this enclosure. I sense that man.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_010_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_010_000.text:
Why do you stalk me so!?
What is the benefit to you!?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_010_010.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_010_010.text:
You think the Dismal King follows you?
A fine jest! I think of you as my tour guide,
and nothing more.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_010_020.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_010_020.text:
Grrr! Enough! You won't
get in my way this time!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_020_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_020_000.text:
I suppose that means one of the
barriers he was seeking is here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_020_010.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_020_010.text:
That jizo statue, perhaps? I've never
seen one quite like that before,
but I know it is a jizo.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_020_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_020_030.text:
Thought things were a bit wild over here,
but you beat me to it. How'd you even find
a barrier when I didn't know it existed?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_020_040.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_020_040.text:
It appears that man is acting as
a tour guide in our little jaunt
across your world.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_020_060.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_020_060.text:
He left after the fight, no doubt to
continue plotting his various schemes.
How many of these barriers are left?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_020_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_020_070.text:
None, bud. You protected all of 'em.
So if he's gonna go anywhere next it's... 
Aw, heck! He's going to Gokakudo Temple,
the center of the barrier!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_020_080.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_020_CUT_020_080.text:
Perhaps he left his winning hand for last.
Still, what an ingenious way of showing
us around the city! Now then, let us head for our
final destination: Gokakudo Temple.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GOKAKUDO_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GOKAKUDO_020_CUT_000_0.text:
Gokakudo Temple will reveal the truth
behind the fae, for here I cut down many
who had taken the guise of humans.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GOKAKUDO_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GOKAKUDO_020_CUT_000_0.text:
Then perhaps we had best think of this final
test as something our guide arranged for
your benefit, Lifetaker.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GOKAKUDO_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GOKAKUDO_020_CUT_000_0.text:
I knew you would come, powerful ones—
and for our final scene, I'm going to use
your power for my own purposes!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_010.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_010.text:
This barrier has recognized you as alien.
So go on—fight to your heart's content.
Either you die, or the barrier shatters.
I emerge victorious either way.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_010.text:
So this is his final way of turning
the tables? Mmm. I'm impressed.
Yet I remain the Dismal King,
and no barrier can contain me!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_010.text:
Stop, guy! That'd just destroy the barrier!
I know a way we can get the temple back
to normal, so just help me out, yeah?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_010.text: What would you have me do?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_010.text:
Fight it. Damage it. Then as the
seasons pass, I'll pray at each one
and calm the temple down!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.text:
I see you failed to both exact your
revenge on me and shatter the barrier.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.text:
We saved the city AND we caught the
shady guy! Can't thank you enough.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.text:
Which means I can no longer rely on
him to guide us on our further journey.
This is unfortunate, for we are not
finished traveling this world.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.text:
Heck, guy. Just lemme know if
there's something I can do.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.text:
Then we shall turn to you
if we ever become lost.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.text:
And with the nuisances dealt with,
let us return to tracing your past.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text:
Osugi, no! Stay out!
Don't go into the Yomi hollow!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text: Sorry, who? My name's Yumeha.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text:
You are not Osugi? In any case, if you pass
through this hollow, you will venture into
the underworld and never return.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text: But my cat went in there!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text:
I will find your cat.
Remain here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text: And who is this Osugi?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text:
The daughter of a relative. She could also see
spirits, and so often stood before this hollow.
But one day, a spirit dragged her inside—
and when I found her, she drew no breath.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text: So she died.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text:
I ventured in and slew the spirit,
at which point life returned to Osugi. She was a girl without friends, so instead she
played with spirits. Sadly, she was afraid of
them hating her, and as a result often found
herself possessed by evil beings.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text: I... I wanted to protect her.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text:
I think I understand now why you became
a killer—and perhaps even why you were
called to Brighthome.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text:
There's the cat. It must have
been drawn in by the spirit.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text:
You seem to have a tendency to
target powerful foes, Lifetaker.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text: My kitty!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text: Oh, thank you so much!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text: It's hungry.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text:
Aw, you wanted something to eat,
kitty? I'm so sorry!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text: Is that the kind of girl Osugi was?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text: No. They're nothing alike.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text: Here you go, Ichizo. This is your sarubobo, isn't it?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text: Osugi...

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text: Mmm. That doll is called a sarubobo? How did it cross time and space to get here? Is this the power of a Brighthome warrior?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text:
I have regained my soul, and no longer
will cut down people without purpose!
I give to you this power I have regained,
Dismal King. Use it well.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text: Then you shall have the brand.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text: Perhaps another time.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text:
I welcome you into my thrall, Lifetaker.
I now have you in my gaze at all times.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text:
Your blood will become a part of me,
and will make me the Dismal King.
Together into eternity shall we live.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_CUT.text: For now, I appreciate the sentiment.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text:
Just banishing that shady fella
from Miyako City.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text:
Why send him hence alive when you know
he will only repeat his misdeeds?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text:
Sounds like something a Dismal King might say.
But this is just how I do things, fella.
I mean, heck, if I were to kill that guy,
someone else would just take his place.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text:
I suppose it is not terrible
to do things your own way.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text:
So, uh, your bud there seems a
little different from last time.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text:
It means only that our trip has ended—
and that we gained something on the way.
And now...farewell!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text:
Yeah, you say that, but where do you think
you're going to go from here? This is a temple,
bud, not Miyako Station.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text:
We came from this gate and will leave through
the same. You banished that man through here,
so you should know well what sort of purpose
it actually serves.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text:
I know this door leads to the Heavens,
but I couldn't tell you what kind of place
the Heavens are.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text: Then come see with your own eyes!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text: And best you keep it that way.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text:
Become the Dismal King's travel buddy?
Yeah, I dunno... No, wait. I do.
I definitely wanna go with you!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text:
Then let us walk together,
Tsunanori Mido.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text:
That carries a lot of weight coming from
the Dismal King, so I'll keep it in mind.
So long there, fella.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.speaker: Tourist_Woman
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.text:
To think the waterfall wouldn't be flowing
TODAY of all days! Someone really should
have put up a sign or something before I
wasted my time coming all the way here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.text:
If I may, madam, what is a waterfall?
Is there something unusual about it?
What sort of being is it?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.speaker: Tourist_Woman
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.text:
Uh... Wow. Okay. I'm talking about Sangen-in
Temple's three waterfalls, which give you
good luck in the areas of health, money,
and love if you drink from them. But the water's not flowing right now,
which means I can't drink it—and I
REALLY need some better luck in the
ol' romance department, let me tell you!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.text:
Something must've happened at the source.
I mean, heck, it's a knot in the barrier, after all.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.text: You believe that man did this?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.text:
Won't know until we check
and see for ourselves, bud.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.speaker: Tourist_Woman
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.text:
Huh? Why do I feel this
sensation of...loss?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.text:
Aw, cripes! That evil wood spirit's
sucking up all the spring water!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.text: It was that man's doing, yes?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.text:
Sure was, guy. Sangen-in Temple is the
northern land of water—no way an evil
spirit from the eastern land of wood
would show its ugly mug up here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.text:
Mmm. Then he must have brought the spirit
here from wherever you said it came from.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_SPRING_000_CU.text:
East, bud. You know? Cardinal direction?
Look, let's just head that way.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
A crowded building does not seem to
be a suitable place for an evil spirit.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
Gosh, I'm with you there—but I'm sure
the shady fella brought that thing out
from inside this place.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
I have a feeling this will be a
considerably less enjoyable stop
on our journey than the others.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
Heck, I never thought going around
to every store would be so tiring.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
And yet, what a delightful little place!
All of the trading posts are collected in one
area and arranged in a way to extract the
most greed possible from the customers. Indeed, I wager there is some manner
of fiend here that draws strength
from said greed.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
Yeah, but the barrier's supposed to keep
fiends like that OUT of Miyako City!
Heck, that's how we keep the peace here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
Hi, Tsunanori! Out shopping with a friend?
Boy, that hat is WILD. I love it!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
I fear the unearthly energy of this place
is causing greed to rise in me as well... Live into eternity with me, madam!
As I keep my gaze locked upon you,
your blood will become my blood and
transform me into the Dismal King!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
Wh-what are you...?
C-can't look away...

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
Say there, Naomi! You know about any weird 
places in the mall? Somewhere with a bunch
of old decorations, maybe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
Tsunanori...? On the roof...
there's this old shrine...
Oooh, why do I feel like this?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
Thanks, Naomi. C'mon, you.
Let's head for the roof.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
So was that some kinda hypnotism technique
you were using there, fella? Or is that just sorta
how the Dismal King rolls?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
Was she an associate of yours? My apologies.
To me, she was but an attractive woman who
drew forth my own greed, for I am not the sort
who can turn from the charms of another.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
That's a heck of an explanation
for trying to get with a lady.
Anyway, here's the roof.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
And the shrine. Alas, someone has forced
it asunder and scattered the contents.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
This is no ordinary item—these scraps
of paper have formed into a talisman.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
Pretty quick on the uptake there, guy.
Yeah, we just copied the ceremonial talisman
that was keeping that evil spirit sealed up.
This should put it back into the shrine.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Mascot_Mall
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
Excuse me, gentlemen,
but the roof is off-limits.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
Fie, what manner of fiend is this!?
Away with you, cretin!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Mascot_Mall
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text: Gya! Owww...

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
Sorry about that, bud!
C'mon, Your Majesty, let's get
outta here before the cops show.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
I suppose there is no way to restore
shredded paper to its original glory.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_000_CUT.text:
Guess we'll just leave it
like this for now.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_000_000.text:
May I assume this tower is the
next knot in the barrier?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Yep. The north-south line that connects
Sangen-in Temple and Rakusuiro Tower
plays a real important role here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_000_020.text:
In my world, there are seven towers that
protect the Dark Castle in the center.
Perhaps this is the reason this place feels
so very comfortable to me.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Her consciousness has been taken from her—
but such party tricks are nothing when set
against my charm. Madam, look into my eyes!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: Kaoruko_Hachijo
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_010_030.text: Ah! Your eyes drew my soul back!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: Kaoruko_Hachijo
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_010_050.text:
It's a trap, Tsunanori! That man placed
this web here to ensnare someone!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_020_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_020_000.text:
It seems he was after us, but his web
is now broken. How fares the barrier?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_020_010.speaker: Kaoruko_Hachijo
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_020_010.text:
You saved me, which means the
magatama remains unharmed.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_020_020.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_020_020.text:
Who are you, woman? You looked me
full in the eyes, which means you are
no ordinary human.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_020_030.speaker: Kaoruko_Hachijo
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_020_030.text:
I have a spell over me that protects my mind,
but that man came here and attacked in the
briefest moment of opening. It is...shameful.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_020_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_020_040.text:
He wanted us to kill the spider and make you
destroy the magatama? That's dirty pool,
but we got the better of him thanks to the
Dismal King fella here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_020_050.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_020_050.text:
...Er, yes. Apologies, but I am currently
experiencing shock in the face of an
individual who is immune to my power.
Give me a moment to collect myself.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_020_060.speaker: Kaoruko_Hachijo
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_020_060.text:
I believe you are perfectly attractive
even without your powers of darkness.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_020_070.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_020_070.text:
She grinds the heel while I'm down!
Oh, but this is a formidable woman!
Please, you must away me from this
place before she beats me to a pulp!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_020_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PAGODA_000_CUT_020_080.text: The heck's gotten into you, bud?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_000_000.text:
The next barrier is here?
In a place for children?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Directionally, this place is in Miyako City's
unlucky southwest. It's opposite the mall,
so yeah, we should find a barrier.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_000_020.text:
You are quite conscious of what direction
things are in relation to one another.
Tell me why this is.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_000_030.text:
The sun rises in the east and sets in the west—
so if you put your left hand to the east and
your right to the west, you'll be facing south
and have your back to the north. Not really that tough, but folks with
no sense of direction just don't get it.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Anyway, northeast is an unlucky direction,
which means it's easy for evil spirits to
come sneaking in that way. And its opposite is the southwest,
which means that's another direction
we need to keep our eyes on.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Mmm. So that's some mannner of rule
inherent to this world, is it?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_000_060.text:
You don't really seem so great when
it comes to cardinal directions, guy.
You slack off in school, maybe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_010_000.text:
The komainu jizo, huh? This jizo should be
the key to the barrier, but I don't sense
anything coming from it.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Either the barrier has already been
destroyed, or it is entirely unrelated.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_010_020.text:
You there! Child! Have you noticed
anything strange about this statue?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_010_030.text:
No, but I notice something strange
about the way you bark questions
at folks, gramps! Hm? Hang on. That tile on its chest is a
different color. Guess that other gramps
came by and messed with it earlier.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_010_040.text:
Heck, I saw that! These sparkle deals
flew off of it every which way!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_010_050.text:
Be more specific there, kiddo.
Which direction did they go?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_010_070.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_010_070.text:
Then I suppose we must find each piece
individually. How many were there?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_010_080.text:
Looking at the indents, probably five?
But Miyako City's a real big place—
sure hope we can track 'em all down.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_010_090.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_010_090.text:
What a perfect opportunity explore
this world! Let us get to it, then.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_010_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_JIZO_000_CUT_010_100.text:
You sure are calm about all this, guy.
Just make sure you don't get us lost.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.text:
Lots of tourists who come to Miyako City
stay in this hotel, so I bet one of 'em saw
what happ—

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tourist_Woman
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.text:
Yessssss! I knew it! My luck in
romance really DID get better!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.text:
I've another question for you, madam:
Have you seen anything in recent memory
that sparkled? I apologize for the rather
vague question, but do try to remember.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tourist_Woman
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.text:
I sure have! I almost forgot about it,
but your question brought it all back.
Your speech is like magic—did you cast
a spell on me, you little trickster!?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.text:
Nope! No spells here, bud!
Now where'd you see the sparkly deals?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tourist_Woman
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.text:
Ex-CUSE me, can you not interrupt?
I don't have time for children.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.text:
I would ask the same of you, madam:
Where did you see these items?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tourist_Woman
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.text:
I saw one around the big pond. I was like,
'Oh hey, something shiny fell into the water!'
when a big creature jumped up and ATE it!
I think it was some kind of fish.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tourist_Woman
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.text:
The second one was stuck to the...
Um, you know that theater on the way
to the mall? It was on its window.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tourist_Woman
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.text:
The third one was, um... Uhhh...
Geez, I swear I saw another one
somewhere, but...

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_000_CUT_000.text:
Whoa! She fainted!
Cripes, guy, you're no joke.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.text:
Someone must've seen something
here at the universi—

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.text:
Oh! Hi there, Tsunanori!
And hi, strange guest!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.text:
Don't look at him, Naomi—he'll steal your soul.
But listen, have you seen any sparkling things
flying through the sky lately?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.text:
Um, you're gonna have to be a touch
more specific, because I have no idea
what you're talking about there.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.text:
The sight of its gleam is burned in the
deep of your mind. Awaken your memories!
Peer into the recesses of your heart!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.text:
Errr... Asahi said he saw something shiny
and ran off towards the abandoned village,
and then I saw a sparkly thing cut across
the corner of my vision...

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.text:
There was also a little kid looking for her cat—
but while I helped her look, she ran off toward
Keihoku Elementary. And in that moment, I saw
another sparkly thing fly towards the school...

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.text:
But I saw another one...
I swear I saw another one...

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.text:
That's enough there! Don't go
trying to remember any more.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.text:
Nothing you need to worry about.
Also, you should go home early today.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.text:
Okay, guy, I'm gonna need you to stop it with
all the peering into folks' minds. Naomi dang
near conked out there, and who knows what
woulda happened if you'd kept going?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_000_CU.text:
Worry not; she and I would
prove a fine match.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.text:
The girls at Rakugaku are the real deal
when it comes to rumors and gossip,
so we just gotta ask Tomoko.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tomoko_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Tsuna? What're you doing here!?
My friends are gonna come wink
at you again if you keep this up.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Need to know if you saw something
shiny fly past this way.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You must have seen something.
Remember it now. Delve. Delve!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Kaoruko_Hachijo
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Oh, if it isn't the Dismal King!
Thank you for helping at the tower.
Did you need to speak with my friend?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Er, uh... No. We were merely asking
after sparkling items in the sky.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Kaoruko_Hachijo
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Oh? In that case, you should ask the
shopkeeper at Rakunan Station—she's
well-known for being a very good
source of information.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_0.text: Weren't you gonna use your powers?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_000_CUT_000_1.text:
They don't work on that girl.
I never want to see her again.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.text:
This has to be where she
saw that sparkly thing.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.text:
And how do you intend to
catch a fish from this pond?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.text:
Well, since there's no fishing allowed,
we'll just have to wait til night.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.speaker: Nigel_Patriot
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.text:
Ah, hello there! Did either of you
need something from me?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.text:
Cripes, bud! You ain't allowed
to swim in the pond!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.speaker: Nigel_Patriot
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.text:
Oh, but I wasn't swimming! I was just
surveying the organisms in the pond.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.text:
Geez, what was with that huge frog!?
Some kind of evil spirit, maybe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.text:
What a noisy man.
Now then, what is this?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.text:
It's one of the sparkly things we were
looking for, remember? It's the same
size as the indents on the jizo statue.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.text:
Ah. Yes. It must have attached
itself to that frog.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_FLOG_000_CUT.text: Probably why the sucker got so big.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_00.text:
That tourist lady called it the theater,
but I think she meant the community hall.
You see any sparkly things on the windows?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_00.text:
No. The woman either saw incorrectly or
had flaws in her memory, but whatever
sparkled here was something else.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_00.text:
You pulled those memories out with your
weirdo powers, slugger—whatever sparkled
here HAS HAS to be related to the jizo statue.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_00.text: You have much faith in my ability.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_00.text:
Look, I still think you're joking with
the whole 'Dismal King' deal, but that
power of yours is legit. Now c'mon, let's ask around inside.
Maybe the janitor cleaned it up.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_01.text:
Pardon me, fella, but we think there was
something sparkling stuck to the window.
Do you know anything about that, maybe?
Got a lot of sentimental value to me.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_01.text: So it was here? That's swell! Think I could have it back, maybe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_01.speaker: Ranko_Nitomura
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_01.text:
Sure you can, fella. Sure.
But if I have to go back in that room...

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_01.text:
All is well. You have me.
You need not worry.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_01.speaker: Ranko_Nitomura
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_01.text:
Huh. I feel a lot better all of
a sudden. Follow me, boys!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_02.speaker: Ranko_Nitomura
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_02.text:
The custodian gave me a shiny object
that I kept on me when I went to put
the piano away.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_02.speaker: Ranko_Nitomura
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_02.text:
But then the piano started playing
by itself! Swear to shoot!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_02.speaker: Ranko_Nitomura
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_02.text:
I felt this real strong urge to sing along,
but the moment I opened my mouth,
some crazy monster showed up!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_03.text:
The tile made your piano ghost stronger,
which is how it manifested. Poor fella
just wanted to sing along with you.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_03.text:
You'll see 'em if you wear your spirit out—
although you probably shouldn't suppress
your desire to sing that much.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_03.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_03.text:
You have a delightful voice, madam.
Do let us hear it again someday.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_03.speaker: Ranko_Nitomura
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_03.text:
Uh, okay! I will. I'll keep practicing
and find an opportunity to perform.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_03.text:
You didn't brute force your way
through it this time, guy.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_03.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_PRIMA_DONNA_000_CUT_03.text:
I like all that is enchanting, and her
voice was more than enough for me.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.text:
Classic Asahi, running off on another
wild adventure. I swear, that fella hasn't
changed since elementary school.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.text:
There is a strange air
about this place.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.text:
This village has been sitting untouched for
a hundred years. You'd think nature would've
taken the thing over, but for some reason
I can't figure, the place is mostly intact.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.text:
There is a will to this land that
refuses to crumble away.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.text:
And because of that, kids—and adults who're
way too old for this sorta thing—come here,
poke around lookin' for 'will,' get spooked,
and run off. Hope that's all it is this time.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.text:
Tsunanori? Aw, heck—I KNEW this
had something to do with you! See, I saw a tree with something shiny
pokin' out of it, but when I got closer,
the thing started walking around!
I'm one dead fella if it gets me!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_000.text:
It has awoken a treant—
a fiend most terrible!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_010.text:
Now that we have retrieved the tile, the evil
spirit vanished of its own accord, and the tree
has returned to being a simple tree.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_010.text:
Your power was a big help
again, fella. Thanks.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_010.text:
I'd say this was below-average
in terms of travel entertainment.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_010.text:
Say, who's this guy, Tsunanori?
Don't really see a lot of folks
dressed like that around here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_010.text:
I am the Dismal King, and your curiosity
is too immature for me to take you into
my thrall. Learn from your experiences.
Let your curiosity mature.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_010.text:
You sound like the counselor at
university, fella! But hey, I get it.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_010.text:
He's right, guy. You gotta quit
acting like some grade-school kid.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Asahi_Sayota
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_010.text:
Well, shoot. Guess I'll be more careful.
Anyway, I've got work, so see ya!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_010.text:
We grew up together. Our houses were
close, so we played together, got in fights,
all that kid stuff. But Asahi there's a true friend—
kind I can rely on for anything.
You got any pals like that, guy?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MOVINGTREE_000_CUT_010.text:
I am a solitary being. I have no
friends, nor do I require them.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
So one of those sparkly deals apparently
flew to Keihoku Elementary. Let's hope
nothing weird's going on there.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Do you have business at this school?
Are you parents, perhaps?
What is your child's name?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text: Aw, geez. Well, we're—

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Miss Erisawa! Miss Erisawa! 
The taxidermy bird flew away!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
What are you talking about, Ren?
Taxidermy animals do not move.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
You don't trust us, Miss Erisawa?
I said the stuffed bird flew off,
and that's just what I meant!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text: This is likely the tile's doing.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Yup—but we still can't just waltz on
into the school without permission.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, hey there, fellas! Wanna help
me look for that missing bird?
Miss Erisawa, these are my uncles.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, if you are his guardians, then might
I ask you to please humor him in regards
to this runaway stuffed bird?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Gosh, she doesn't believe me at all.
C'mon, uncles! Let's go!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Heck, guy, I'm not THAT old.
Can't I be your brother, maybe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text: Where'd the bird go, Izumi!?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
The dump behind the gym.
I wonder if it's looking for food.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Look, the bird's right there!
It DID fly off!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Explain the workings of this 'taxidermy.'
That animal clearly has no life, yet it moves.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Taxidermy's when you take a dead
animal and make it look alive.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
And thus it moves. Mmm.
Then why all the fuss?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Taxidermied animals don't move, guy. They...
Cripes, how do I even explain this to you?
Look, all you need to know is that this bird
is related to the shiny deal.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Dangit, Uncle One and Uncle Two!
If you just stand there yakkin'
it's gonna get away again!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Then let us capture it, after which you
will explain taxidermy to me at length.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
We have retrieved the tile,
and the taxidermied bird is still.
Is it broken?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Nope! All good here, bud.
Thing's back to normal.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
I cannot say I have entirely made sense
of this situation... What of you, child?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, crud. We've got no evidence the
stuffed bird was moving, which means
Miss Erisawa's gonna give me the total
stink eye when we get back.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text: Well, even if she doesn't buy it, you know you did the right thing.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Hey, that's right—and fighting without 
recognition makes you an ally of justice!
Smell ya later, uncles.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text: An ally of justice, eh?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text: No, I am a king of darkness.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SCHOOL_GHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Thank you for believing Ren.
Here, you can have this.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_000_CUT_000.text:
Kaoruko said we should talk
to the gal at this store.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_000_CUT_000.text:
I've a question for you, madam:
Have you seen something bright
and shining fly past—

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ume
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_000_CUT_000.text:
Welcome, young fellas!
How can I help today?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ume
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_000_CUT_000.text:
I'm Ume, top beaut of the shops here
at Rakunan Station. Don't think I've
seen you boys around here before.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_000_CUT_000.text:
Speak, madam. Have you seen something
bright and shining fly past this place?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ume
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_000_CUT_000.text:
I did indeed—sure was a curious sight! 
My big sister ran off after it. I wonder
if she found anything.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_000_CUT_000.text:
I would not think a woman older
than this one to be capable of
running after anything.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_000_CUT_000.text:
Normally I'd agree with you, bud,
but your power drew those words out,
so it's gotta be true.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_000_CUT_000.text:
Even I am not entirely certain my
powers worked on that crone.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_000_CUT_000.text:
Guess that means she's
no ordinary lady, maybe.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.text:
Wherever did this missing
sister run off to?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.text:
She must have a great set of legs on her—
which means there's no way we're dealing
with a normal old lady here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.text:
You there! Have you seen an
old woman running around these—

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Take
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.text:
What do you want, young man? Newspaper?
Magazine? I don't sell smokes anymore.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.text:
Hey there, ma'am. Would you happen
to be the big sister to the lady down at
Rakunan Station, maybe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Take
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.text:
Ume? Oh yes, she's my little sister.
Now are you gonna buy something or
just stand there wasting my time?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.text:
Speak, madam. Have you seen something
bright and shining fly this way?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Take
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.text:
Oh, I sure did—but I'm not telling
you squat until you buy something!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.text:
Uh, then we'll take two bottles
of tea, please and thank you.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Take
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.text:
Right, so, it was an odd sight, believe you me!
My big sister ran off after it. I wonder if she
found anything.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.text:
Another sister? They may as well
be fiends at this point.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_010_CUT_000.text:
Dunno about that, fella,
but they're definitely not normal.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_020_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_020_CUT_000.text:
Never thought we'd wander 
this far outside the city.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_020_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_020_CUT_000.text:
I do enjoy a fine stroll through mountains
and trees—this has proved to be a worthy
stop on our little excursion.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_020_CUT_000.speaker: Matsu
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_020_CUT_000.text:
Eh!? You there! Why's a whippersnapper
like you talking like an old-timer!?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_020_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_020_CUT_000.text:
Speak, madam. Have you seen something
bright and shining fly across the sky?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_020_CUT_000.speaker: Matsu
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_020_CUT_000.text:
Sure as shoot did, young man! I chased
it all this way, but lost sight of it. At first, I was chasing the light, but then
it stuck itself to a parked motorcycle and
zoomed off with no rider or anything!
Fast as anything, I tell you what.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_020_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_020_CUT_000.text:
You must be in great shape to
go chasin' after motorcycles.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_020_CUT_000.speaker: Matsu
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_020_CUT_000.text:
Is that head of yours empty? I was ridin' some
wheels of my own! Live long enough in this city
and you'll see all sorts of oddities—so have a care
if you're going to chase down that shiny!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_020_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_020_CUT_000.text:
This riderless motorcycle's gotta
be one of the Jizo tiles.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_020_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_020_CUT_000.text:
I am surprised the woman was no fiend.
Still, how are we to find this vehicle?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_020_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_020_CUT_000.text:
I just hope it's hiding nearby,
because my poor legs are dyin'.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_030_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_030_CUT_000.text:
That contraption does not
seem to belong here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_030_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_030_CUT_000.text:
Heck, that's the motorcycle!
So where's that triangle?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_030_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_030_CUT_000.text:
Hang on. I don't think the manufacturer's
logo is supposed to look like this.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_030_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_030_CUT_000.text: This triangle must be the tile.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_030_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GHOST_BIKE_030_CUT_000.text:
We finally found it!
Cripes, I'm exhausted.

SUB_W01_FUNC_SIUG_TILE_COMP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_FUNC_SIUG_TILE_COMP_000_CUT_000_.text:
Does this not mean we have
secured all the wayward tiles?

SUB_W01_FUNC_SIUG_TILE_COMP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_FUNC_SIUG_TILE_COMP_000_CUT_000_.text:
Sure does, guy. Now let's go back
to the statues in the park.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.text:
These tiles are all different colors, yet they share
a shape. Is there a significance to the order in
which they go? Do you remember how these
colors are meant to fit together?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.text:
You serious there, guy? Heck, a fella
could see stuff like this every day
and still forget how it goes.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.text:
Hey there, kiddo. You got any idea
how the tiles are supposed to go
on this Jizo statue, maybe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.speaker: Yumeha_Izumi
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.text:
Sorry, I just transferred here.
Oh, but I bet Ren would know!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.text:
Hey, you're those two fellas from the
other day! Need my help, maybe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.text:
Speak, child. Tell us what color
belongs in which place.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.text:
Fine, I'll tell you again—
but this is the last dang time!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.text:
Heck, fella, can't believe you put that back
together with so little info—guess this
Dismal King deal comes with perks. But boy, it sure looks like the statue's
calmed down—I even feel a warm sort
of energy coming from it.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.text:
This means we've guarded
all four barriers.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.text:
Then my journey with you is at an end.
Yet while I saw many sights in this world,
I was unable to retrace Lifetaker's past,
and so will continue searching alone.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.text:
Well now, hold on just a second there.
I think there's one more place that
shady fella's targeting: the center
of the barriers at Gokakudo Temple. And since I've got no idea what he's
planning for the end, I hope you don't
mind if I tag along for this last bit.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.text:
Gokakudo Temple? Mmm. Sounds important.
I suppose there's a chance that man is expecting
the Dismal King's presence there.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_KOMAINU_JIZO_010_CUT_0.text:
Aw, cripes! We forgot about the talismans
back at the shrine in Sequoia Mall!
We gotta go put 'em together.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_000.text:
Okay, swell. Gokakudo Temple's safe—
I don't think the shady guy's here yet.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_000.text:
I see I cannot slip by unnoticed by those
with power. But little matter, for I was
planning to reveal myself to you eventually.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_000.text:
You enclose your world in a barrier,
yet why not make it open instead? You there. The one with power. You have seen
many things, and surely understand what is
so wonderful about the Conjoined Worlds.
Will you not inform that fool beside you?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_000.text:
Would you name yourself a god and push
the ways of another on these people? Each world does things in their own way.
If a world prefers to be open or closed,
that is their right to decide.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_000.text:
There is but one set of laws among the
Conjoined Worlds—and if you will not
accept that, I will force it upon you!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_000.text:
I have already ensured that the spirits
of this land follow the law to the letter,
so let me demonstrate its power now!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_010.text:
My power is victorious over your law,
for I am the Dismal King.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_010.text:
Can't thank you enough for helping us
throw that fella in the slammer, King.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_010.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_010.text:
Gokakudo Temple is the place that will
reveal the truth behind the fae; I have cut
down countless of their number here
who had taken the guise of humans.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas
