SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_010.text:
Ah, I see you've remembered a bit.
Shall we continue our journey, then?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_010.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_CONSPIRACY_000_CUT_010.text:
No. I am Lifetaker. That will not
change, but it is also enough.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_AMANO_IWATO_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_010_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_010_CUT_000.text:
While I cannot take you with me, a portion
of you will remain with me for eternity.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_010_CUT_000.speaker: Tourist_Woman
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_010_CUT_000.text:
May a part of me forever stay 
with you, Your Dismal Majesty...

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_010_CU.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_010_CU.text:
Hail, charming madam!
I have come to retrieve you!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_010_CU.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_010_CU.text:
You have!? Er, I mean, yes!
I'd be delighted to go with you.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Kaoruko_Hachijo
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Well, if it isn't the Dismal King.
Have you been enjoying your little
sightseeing tour of Miyako City?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_010_CUT_000_0.text:
I have—but the time has come
for me to abandon this place.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Kaoruko_Hachijo
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_010_CUT_000_0.text:
You came all this way to say goodbye?
Aw, that's sweet.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Kaoruko_Hachijo
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Wait! Know that I will not allow any harm
to come to the good people of Miyako City.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Kaoruko_Hachijo
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_010_CUT_000_0.text:
I am delighted to see how reasonable
you are, Your Majesty. Now, farewell.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_FALL_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_FALL_000_CUT_.text:
This waterfall is one of Miyako City's 
best sightseeing spots. Folks say you'll
have a long life if you drink from it.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_FALL_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_FALL_000_CUT_.text: I am immortal. I need no longer life.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_FALL_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_SANGENIN_FALL_000_CUT_.text: Immortal, eh? So people like that do exist.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.text:
Is this large building the
fortress of some local lord?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Information_Staff
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.text:
This is Miyako Theater—guess you could
call it a fortress of art, maybe.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Information_Staff
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.text:
Yes indeed! Our schedule's jam-packed with
fascinating performances, so please check
our home page and pick up tickets to
whatever strikes your fancy!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.text:
The people of Miyako have
ever enjoyed the theater.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.text:
Did you watch such things
as well, Lifetaker?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.text:
The best I ever saw were three-sentence
plays at the riverside; I lacked the funds
to see famous actors at the playhouses.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.text:
I doubt I have ever heard your
voice filled with such joy.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.text:
There are naught but children here.
An educational facility, perhaps?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.text:
A school, I believe—a place where
children are taught to read and write.
I myself have never been.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.text:
Welcome to Keihoku Elementary School.
Do you have business here?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.text:
No. We are simply stopping by
during our travels.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.text:
Miss Erisawa! Miss Erisawa! I...
Huh? Sorry. Didn't see that you
were talkin' to someone.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.text:
Do you enjoy being taught
your letters, child?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.text:
Naw, studying's a pain.
But I like lunch!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.text:
Did you ever want to go
to a place like this?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.text:
I know not; I never had the
desire to read or write.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
Is this an educational facility
for young women alone?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Sophia_Beniike
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
Boy, that fella's a real hottie!
Go talk to him, Tomoko!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Tomoko_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
What!? Why me!? Also, he looks
way more suspicious than hot.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Sophia_Beniike
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
But you're all about suspicious!
Heck, just look at your brother—
that fella's weird as all get out.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Tomoko_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
Umm... Hi there. Are you filming
a movie or something, maybe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Tomoko_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
See, 'cause I was thinking, 'Wow, those
fellas really stand out!' which made me
wonder if you were in the entertainment
business or something.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Tomoko_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
Uh? Oh. Well, okay then!
Have fun in Miyako City!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Tomoko_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
Okay, don't act like you
had no part in this!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
What manner of place
is this, Lifetaker?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
I do not know. Some places forbade women,
and likewise some allowed only women.
But I know nothing of this place.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text: What a strange world this is.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_CUT.text: Excuse me, fella! You dropped this.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_CUT.speaker: Koutarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_CUT.text:
Oh gosh, thanks so much!
...Wait, what!? Nooo!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_CUT.speaker: Koutarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_CUT.text:
This is the charm I bought to pray for my
son's success in his exams. He's studying
to get into middle school, don't you know,
so I came here just to get this.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_CUT.text:
Oh, so that's why you're panicked!
Well, no worries, guy—all you saw
was some evil spirits getting purified!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_CUT.speaker: Koutarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_CUT.text:
Uh, is that really what it was?
I mean, gosh, if you say so...

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_CUT.speaker: Koutarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_CUT.text:
Wait! Now hold on just a second there!
Are you the folks I saw on the roof of
Sequoia Mall?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_CUT.text:
The roof? Sorry, bud, but the only
person I ever saw on the roof was...
No way, are you the mall mascot!? Er, sorry about that, fella—didn't mean
to yell. Just shocked, is all.

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_CUT.speaker: Koutarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_CUT.text:
Yeah no, I'm surprised by the coincidence
as well. Anyway, I need to be getting home.
Thanks again for finding this!

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_CUT.text:
So that man transformed by wearing a
costume? And that little charm is of
vital import to him somehow?

SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_SIUG_FATHER_THOUGHT_000_CUT.text:
Yeah, it's not really related to anything
we've got going on here, but it's sure
important to that fella's family.

SUB_W01_LTXT_SIUG_RAKUHOKUSTA_000_CUT_00.speaker: HERO
SUB_W01_LTXT_SIUG_RAKUHOKUSTA_000_CUT_00.text:
Rakuto Station is close to Sequoia Mall,
and Rakunan Station is close to Keihoku
Elementary School. Where should I go?

SUB_W01_LTXT_SIUG_RAKUTOSTA_000_CUT_000_.speaker: HERO
SUB_W01_LTXT_SIUG_RAKUTOSTA_000_CUT_000_.text:
Rakuhoku Station is close to Miyako Imperial
University, and Rakunan Station is close to
